title: Unveiling Eldegoss: Solving the Quiz Professor’s Riddle in Detective Pikachu Returns
description: In the latest installment of the Detective Pikachu Returns game, players are faced with a challenging question from the Quiz Professor during their exploration of the Southern Ruins. The question, “What Pokémon is soft and fluffy all over?” puzzled many players, as there are numerous fluffy Pokémon in the National Pokedex, such as Mareep, Whimsicott, ... Read more

title: Pentagon Boosts AI Development for Indo-Pacific Commander
description: In a proactive effort to bolster its technological arsenal, the Pentagon has expedited the development of cutting-edge artificial intelligence (AI) tools. These AI tools are set to provide crucial support to Admiral John Aquilino, who currently serves as the commander of U.S. forces in the Indo-Pacific region.  This strategic move comes in response to the ... Read more

title: BTCC Announces Major VIP Program Update with as Low as 0.01% Trading Fees
description: Lithuania, Lithuania, September 28th, 2023, Chainwire BTCC, a renowned cryptocurrency exchange with a long-standing presence in the industry, has recently made significant updates to its VIP program, aiming to provide more benefits to its users. The revised program offers reduced trading fees for all VIP customers and simplifies the requirements for tier upgrades. These changes ... Read more

title: Kraken expanding in Europe, to acquire Dutch broker BCM
description: Kraken has announced its intention to acquire Coin Meester B.V. (BCM), a cryptocurrency broker based in the Netherlands

title: SBF trial day 3: ex-FTX CEO committed fraud, co-founder Gary Wang testifies
description: Adam Yedidia, Sam Bankman-Fried’s MIT buddy and former FTX developer, resumed his testimony under immunity on Oct. 5 in SBF's trial

title: Hedera Hashgraph’s Bold Move: Streamlining Development with EVM Transition
description: Hedera plans to retire the hethers.js library by October 20, 2023, to align with Ethereum Virtual Machine standards. Developers using hethers.js should switch to EVM tools like ethers.js or web3.js, but the library will still be on GitHub without updates. Hedera, a prominent blockchain platform, has announced the upcoming deprecation of its hethers.js library. This [...]

title: VeChain, Cardano, Stellar, Verge, and Algorand Are ISO 20022 Compliant and Ready to Conquer the Trillion-Dollar International Payments Market
description: Five major cryptocurrencies have secured ISO 20022 compliance, potentially enabling them to be recognized by centralized banks. The ISO 20022 standard is geared to revolutionize the global payments sector, with compliant cryptos poised to enter top financial institutions’ databases. In a world rapidly transitioning towards financial standardization, ISO 20022 emerges as the future of modern [...]
